citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 am on
08/27/2015.
Though usually home on Thursdays, Mr. Lapp is away today helping a previous neighbor build a shop. Mrs. Lapp is
unfamiliar with the kennel.
